name: Rush Hard or Die - Crazy Taxi & Truck On the Zig Zag Highway Racing
name_original: Rush Hard or Die - Crazy Taxi & Truck On the Zig Zag Highway Racing
description:
Drive your crazy car, Zig zag road is ahead of you...
Just tap screen to change the direction of your vehicle.

How far can you go?

- Do not fall off
- Do as many zigzags as you can!
- Try not to fall off the edges!
- 11 different vehicles, taxi, cars, trucks and even school bus!
